metadata.title: CVE-2022-47938 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in ksmbd in the Linux kernel 5.15 through 5.19before 5.19.2. fs/ksmbd/smb2misc.c has an out-of-bounds read and OOPS forSMB2_TREE_CONNECT.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-53-generic - 5.15.0-53.59~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-53-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-53.59~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-53-generic - 5.15.0-53.59~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-53-generic-64k - 5.15.0-53.59~20.04.1
No subscription required

No subscription required
